methods.name: public Builder setSchemaType(@NonNull String schemaType)
methods.comment: Sets schemaType, which will be as the id when converting to {@link GenericDocument}.

methods.name: public Builder setVisibilityConfig(@NonNull SchemaVisibilityConfig schemaVisibilityConfig)
methods.comment:
* Resets all values contained in the VisibilityConfig with the values from the given
         * VisibiltiyConfig.

methods.name: public Builder setNotDisplayedBySystem(boolean notDisplayedBySystem)
methods.comment: Sets whether this schema has opted out of platform surfacing.

methods.name: public Builder addVisibleToPackage(@NonNull PackageIdentifier packageIdentifier)
methods.comment:
* Add {@link PackageIdentifier} of packages which has access to this schema.
         *
         * @see SchemaVisibilityConfig.Builder#addAllowedPackage

methods.name: public Builder clearVisibleToPackages()
methods.comment:
* Clears the list of packages which have access to this schema.
         *
         * @see SchemaVisibilityConfig.Builder#clearAllowedPackages

methods.name: public Builder addVisibleToPermissions(@NonNull Set<Integer> visibleToPermissions)
methods.comment:
* Adds a set of required Android {@link android.Manifest.permission} combination a package
         * needs to hold to access the schema.
         *
         * @see SchemaVisibilityConfig.Builder#addRequiredPermissions

methods.name: public Builder clearVisibleToPermissions()
methods.comment:
* Clears all required permissions combinations set to this {@link SchemaVisibilityConfig}.
         *
         * @see SchemaVisibilityConfig.Builder#clearRequiredPermissions

methods.name: public Builder setPubliclyVisibleTargetPackage(@Nullable PackageIdentifier packageIdentifier)
methods.comment:
* Specify that this schema should be publicly available, to the same packages that have
         * visibility to the package passed as a parameter. This visibility is determined by the
         * result of {@link android.content.pm.PackageManager#canPackageQuery}.
         *
         * @see SchemaVisibilityConfig.Builder#setPubliclyVisibleTargetPackage

methods.name: public Builder addVisibleToConfig(@NonNull SchemaVisibilityConfig schemaVisibilityConfig)
methods.comment:
* Add the {@link SchemaVisibilityConfig} for a caller need to match to access the schema * this {@link InternalVisibilityConfig} represents. * *

You can call this method repeatedly to add multiple {@link SchemaVisibilityConfig}, * and the querier will have access if they match ANY of the {@link SchemaVisibilityConfig}. * * @param schemaVisibilityConfig The {@link SchemaVisibilityConfig} hold all requirements * that a call must match to access the schema.

methods.name: public Builder clearVisibleToConfig()
methods.comment: Clears the set of {@link SchemaVisibilityConfig} which have access to this schema.
